con:interface.name: C360ClientServiceSoapBinding
con:interface.con:content:
<wsdl:definitions xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://soa.example.com/client/c360service" xmlns:com="http://soa.example.com/common/messages" xmlns:pol="http://soa.example.com/policy/service" targetNamespace="http://soa.example.com/client/c360service">
<wsdl:types> <xsd:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified"> <xsd:import namespace="http://soa.example.com/common/messages" schemaLocation="#CommonMessageSchema"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://soa.example.com/policy/service" schemaLocation="#PolicyServiceSchema"/>
<xsd:element name="GetClientSummaryRequest"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ClientID" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1"/> <xsd:element name="SecurityContext" type="com:ContextType"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types>
<wsdl:message name="SummaryInput"><wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:GetClientSummaryRequest"/></wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="SummaryOutput"><wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:GetClientSummaryResponse"/></wsdl:message>
<wsdl:portType name="C360ClientPort"> <wsdl:operation name="GetClientSummary"> <wsdl:input message="tns:SummaryInput"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:SummaryOutput"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType>
</wsdl:definitions>

con:interface.name: PolicyServiceSoapBinding
con:interface.con:content:
<xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://soa.example.com/policy/service" elementFormDefault="qualified">
<xsd:complexType name="PolicyDetailsType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="PolicyNumber" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="Status" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:element name="GetPolicyDetailsRequest" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="GetPolicyDetailsResponse"> <xsd:complexType><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="Policy" type="tns:PolicyDetailsType"/></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType> </xsd:element>
</xsd:schema>

con:interface.name: CommonMessages
con:interface.con:content:
<xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://soa.example.com/common/messages" elementFormDefault="qualified">
<xsd:complexType name="ContextType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="AuthToken" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="SourceSystem" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType>
<xsd:complexType name="ErrorType"> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema>
